title: Home
creator_credit: Zephlyn Neilsen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Zephlyn Neilsen reflects on the meaning of home through her recollections of growing up in rural Victoria. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
creator_credit_for_label: Zephlyn Neilsen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
